title: Simmons picks creative agency for regional push
desc: Simmons, the mattress pioneer behind the Beautyrest brand, has reappointed The Secret Little Agency (TSLA) following a closed-door pitch.

title: Honor X6d 5G launches with 90Hz display, 50MP camera, and 5260mAh battery
desc: Honor X6d 5G debuts with Dimensity 6300 chipset, 50MP camera, Android 16, and 5260mAh battery. Check specifications, features, variants, pricing, and availability details.

title: MG Morning Breeze: Updates to Skim before Market
desc: Morning Breeze aims to lessen the load for its readers by curating noteworthy updates from the preceding day.

title: Ateez in Singapore: In Your Fantasy tour thrills fans with solo stages and high-octane energy
desc: Ateez lit up the Singapore Indoor Stadium on Feb 22 with high-energy group and solo stages during their In Your Fantasy world tour, showcasing all-rounder talent.

title: Tokyo Skytree lift malfunctions, trapping 20 people for about 5 hours
desc: Some 1,200 people were stranded temporarily on observation decks hundreds of metres above ground. Read more at straitstimes.com.

title: Sydney Water ordered to clean Malabar treatment plant where fatberg is birthing poo balls
desc: Environment watchdog says water corporation is ‘responsible for ensuring it doesn’t pollute our beautiful beaches’

title: Stocks To Watch, February 23: IDFC First Bank, textiles, shrimp, auto ancillary stocks, SBI, YES Bank, Axis Bank, CreditAccess Grameen, RailTel, WeWork India
desc: Stocks To Watch: Shares of IDFC First Bank will be in focus on Monday, February 23, after the bank informed exchanges on Sunday that it has detected fraudulent activities by certain employees at a particular branch in Chandigarh, amounting to ₹590 crore.

title: Analysts Split on Nigeria's Interest Rates
desc: Will Nigeria's MPC cut the interest rate? Analysts are divided as slowing inflation and a stronger naira make a strong case for a potential rate cut.

title: Pally Agro Unveils Expansion Plan & Distribution Model
desc: Pally Agro Group announces a major expansion plan, introducing a new territorial distribution system and partner incentives to grow its market share.

title: Daily aspirin does not lower cancer risk in older adults
desc: The end is nigh for using aspirin in primary prevention among older adults.
